TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed InstanceEncodingOption extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Contains options that specify whether the persistence provider should encode the instance state information using the GZip algorithm before saving the state information into the persistence store.

remarks.format: ## Remarks [!INCLUDE[netfx40_long](~/includes/netfx40-long-md.md)] ships with a SQL persistence provider as a constituent of the SQL Workflow Instance Store, which is a concrete implementation of the <xref:System.Runtime.Persistence.InstanceStore> class and is used to persist state information in to the SQL Server database. When the `instanceEncodingOption` attribute is set to GZip for the <xref:System.Activities.DurableInstancing.SqlWorkflowInstanceStore> service behavior associated with a service, the SQL persistence provider uses the GZip algorithm to encode instance state information for the instance of the service before saving the state information into the SQL Server persistence database.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Activities.DurableInstancing.InstanceEncodingOption GZip = int32(1)

Docs.summary: Specifies that instance data is compressed using the GZip algorithm.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Activities.DurableInstancing.InstanceEncodingOption None = int32(0)

Docs.summary: Specifies that instance data is not compressed.
